data.name: Z001
data.value: 很抱歉, 目前沒有空房間, 請稍待一會

data.name: Z002
data.value: 是否儲存遊戲?

data.name: Z003
data.value: 是否休息一下

data.name: Z004
data.value: 黃金

data.name: Z005
data.value: 感謝您的消費

data.name: Z006
data.value: 歡迎再度光臨

data.name: Z007
data.value: 遊戲已儲存, 您是否需要休息一下

data.name: Z008
data.value: 先生, 很抱歉你沒有足夠的黃金

data.name: Z009
data.value: 我想你不會想去那裡!

data.name: Z010
data.value: 今天的天氣真適合散步, 是吧?

data.name: Z011
data.value: 真不敢相信, 你居然打敗了所有的土匪. 你是我的英雄!

data.name: Z012
data.value: 真高興能見到你, 英雄

data.name: Z013
data.value: 你找到三個紅色藥水

data.name: Z014
data.value: 小心點, 你還沒有痊癒. 別太操勞了!

data.name: Z015
data.value: You were so brave, fighting off those bandits. I hope you didn't hurt yourself.

data.name: Z016
data.value: He is dead. There is nothing you can do for him.

data.name: Z017
data.value: Hey buddy, can you please help me?

data.name: Z018
data.value: 我把我最珍貴的寶物遺失在這個村莊裡了

data.name: Z019
data.value: 如果你可以幫我找到它,我將會報答你!

data.name: Z020
data.value: 我記的我最後一次看到它是我在井邊喝酒的時候

data.name: Z021
data.value: hey兄弟, 你在那邊拿到了什麼?

data.name: Z022
data.value: 我最珍貴的寶物是不是在水井附近?

data.name: Z023
data.value: 太感謝你了! 這邊是

data.name: Z024
data.value: 黃金, 報答你的辛勞!

data.name: Z025
data.value: 太感謝你了! 這邊是

data.name: Z026
data.value: 黃金, 報答你的辛勞!

data.name: Z027
data.value: 感謝你再次找到我珍貴的寶物!

data.name: Z028
data.value: 嗨 你早阿~!

data.name: Z029
data.value: 我看到你有一些種子, 真希望我能幫你種這些種子,但是我的產子不見了.

data.name: Z030
data.value: 我相信是森林南部小鎮,該死的土匪拿的

data.name: Z031
data.value: 哇, 小姐! 我看到那那些就像一群雜草長在花園該死的土匪. 你真了不起!

data.name: Z032
data.value: 歡迎回來小姐!重來沒看過妳離開, 城裡的人都在討論妳呢.

data.name: Z033
data.value: 太棒了~~

data.name: Z034
data.value: 讓我幫你種這些迷人的種子吧! 免費!!

data.name: Z035
data.value: 你終於回來了阿,它們都長大了!

data.name: Z036
data.value: 抱歉小姐,它還是沒長出來

data.name: Z037
data.value: 你一定要有耐心點,這是農場經營

data.name: Z038
data.value: 你的種子已經長大,你隨時都可以把它帶走

data.name: Z039
data.value: 你可能在想這是什麼,其實我自己也在思考

data.name: Z040
data.value: 我現在就可以告訴你 它一定不會是玉米... HAYUK! HAYUK! HAYUK!

data.name: Z041
data.value: 小姐, 我能幫你

data.name: Z042
data.value: 能看到您回來真好

data.name: Z043
data.value: 正如你所見,我的傷口已經完全治癒好了, 我希望我弟弟也能好起來

data.name: Z044
data.value: 在你們的戰鬥中那個穿的紅色圍巾的突匪殺死了他,然後像個懦夫一樣的逃進了森林南部的小鎮

data.name: Z045
data.value: 要不我有責任保護這個村莊,我一定會找到他然後為我弟報酬!

data.name: Z046
data.value: 什麼?紅色圍巾?

data.name: Z047
data.value: 我弟可以安息了,感謝你

data.name: Z048
data.value: 請收下,這是我的弟的.我相信他會希望你能收下.

data.name: Z049
data.value: 祝你一路順風

data.name: Z050
data.value: 哇! 是你! 村子的英雄!

data.name: Z051
data.value: 我聽到土匪王準備接收蘑菇森林,我本來是為了打敗這個壞蛋,但是我失敗了

data.name: Z052
data.value: 我祖母一定很擔心我,你能幫助我找到回家的路嗎?

data.name: Z053
data.value: 唉唷. 我那奸詐的老祖母說她永遠不會讓我離開房子!

data.name: Z054
data.value: 這是你的劍. 經過我精湛的手藝. 你可以在你的物品籃找到你的劍

data.name: Z055
data.value: 別這樣看這我小兄弟, 我只會製造武器,我不會使用它

data.name: Z056
data.value: 還有我知道你沒有錢,滾開!

data.name: Z057
data.value: 你們這邊有什麼? 劍柄嗎?這個劍柄已經損壞的很嚴重,但我不知道怎麼辦

data.name: Z058
data.value: 交給我修理

data.name: Z059
data.value: 黃金,所以以想說什麼? 我一整天都拿不到

data.name: Z060
data.value: 明天就可以修好了

data.name: Z061
data.value: 滾開! 你這個小氣鬼!

data.name: Z062
data.value: 蛤? 你是聾子嗎? 我說你明天就可以拿到了! 你可以走了!

data.name: Z063
data.value: 你拯救了我們村莊,所以你到底想要什麼?獎章? 滾開我的店!

data.name: Z064
data.value: 不要在浪費我的時間了! 你就是沒有錢.

data.name: Z065
data.value: 我所有的東西都賣光了,請稍後再來.

data.name: Z066
data.value: 你想要看我的商品嗎?

data.name: Z067
data.value: 沒關西,感謝你拯救了我們的村莊

data.name: Z068
data.value: 你以拿起流浪者的珍貴寶物

data.name: Z069
data.value: 很高興你好多了.只要你需要你可以待在我們的村莊

data.name: Z070
data.value: 我看到你拯救了我們的村莊,你的劍術真是令人驚艷!

data.name: Z071
data.value: 讓我提供你一些幫助,這裡是

data.name: Z072
data.value: 黃金

data.name: Z073
data.value: 我的村永遠都歡迎你!歡迎再來!

data.name: Z074
data.value: 我看我女兒已經決定要跟著妳了

data.name: Z075
data.value: 依照我的經驗,當她下定決心後是很難改變的

data.name: Z076
data.value: 拜託請好好照顧她,她是我的唯一.

data.name: Z077
data.value: 歡迎回來, Nathan

data.name: Z078
data.value: 在磨菇森林要保持警覺,土匪王布個好惹的傢伙

data.name: Z079
data.value: 哇這不是土匪王的黃冠嗎?你真了不起年輕人!

data.name: Z080
data.value: 請收下這個東西當作我們村子的謝禮

data.name: Z081
data.value: 你已收到1000黃金 和 光榮之戒

data.name: Z082
data.value: 你必須檢起磨菇, 請查看你的物品籃

data.name: Z083
data.value: 在磨菇後面的樹有一隻壞掉的劍插在土壤上

data.name: Z084
data.value: 你收到 一隻劍柄 和 蘑菇, 劍柄上的記號好熟悉, 請查看您的物品籃

data.name: Z085
data.value: 你找到 正義之戒

data.name: Z086
data.value: 你找到 補藥(小)

data.name: Z087
data.value: 你找到 藥水(小)

data.name: Z088
data.value: 你找到 補藥(中) X2

data.name: Z089
data.value: 你找到 藥水(大)

data.name: Z090
data.value: 你找到 正義之戒

data.name: Z091
data.value: 你的種子已成熟

data.name: Z092
data.value: 你撿起 Mysteria

data.name: Z093
data.value: 謝謝你的蘑菇, Sonny

data.name: Z094
data.value: 哇!你找到好多磨菇. 可以為我孫子做很棒的蘑菇湯, 但我還需要更多

data.name: Z095
data.value: 你可以在幫我找一些嗎? 你人真好

data.name: Z096
data.value: 我孫子病很重.他最喜歡蘑菇湯了.他總是特別開心當他在喝湯的時候

data.name: Z097
data.value: 唉. 我已經沒有磨菇了. 我該怎麼做. 我太老了已經沒辦法自己去採蘑菇了

data.name: Z098
data.value: 這樣就夠了, 感謝你的幫忙 這邊是

data.name: Z099
data.value: 黃金,當作我的答謝

data.name: Z100
data.value: 什麼?你找到了劍柄? 這看起來不錯 Sonny.

data.name: Z101
data.value: 哇, 我想這些蘑菇已經足夠做我孫子的蘑菇湯了

data.name: Z102
data.value: 你看, 我孫子真的病很重, 蘑菇湯總上能讓他感覺好一點. 來..把蘑菇放在桌上.

data.name: Z103
data.value: 真的很感謝你, 這裡是

data.name: Z104
data.value: 黃金, 當作我的答謝

data.name: Z105
data.value: 什麼?你找到了劍柄? 這看起來不錯 Sonny.

data.name: Z106
data.value: 我真的超怕那些土匪, 我以為我的心臟要停了,謝謝你就了我們Sonny

data.name: Z107
data.value: 天阿.....Sonny 我的孫子不見了!

data.name: Z108
data.value: 我想他可能去蘑菇森林了, 至從你離開以後就經常看到土匪在哪裡出沒.

data.name: Z109
data.value: 天阿, 我好擔心他, 你可以幫我一個忙嗎?幫我找找他. 我也會去找找只是我這些老骨頭可能不重用了.

data.name: Z110
data.value: 真高興你能找到我孫子! 拜託 這些東西請收下 !

data.name: Z111
data.value: 感謝您的再次幫忙, Sonny

data.name: Z112
data.value: 你以撿起 一本筆記

data.name: Z113
data.value: 我祖母不會再讓我離開床了, 他一直覺得我病很重

data.name: Z114
data.value: 但我才不是! 我是村子中最強的戰士, 我這麼強壯怎麼可能生病

data.name: Z115
data.value: 我才不想管她說什麼! 我就是要離開床布!

data.name: Z116
data.value: 喀! 喀! 唉......我想我還是在躺一下子好了.

data.name: Z117
data.value: 哇! 你真的結決了那些骯髒的的土匪? 其實我也想幫助你, 但是你也知道我那個奸詐的祖母不會讓我去的

data.name: Z118
data.value: 你找到 藥水(大)

data.name: Z119
data.value: 你找到 補藥(中)

data.name: Z120
data.value: 你找到 訓練者的腰帶

data.name: Z121
data.value: 你找到 魔法戰鬥之戒

data.name: Z122
data.value: 你找到 補藥(大)

data.name: Z123
data.value: 你找到 天空之鍊

data.name: Z124
data.value: 你找到 自然之鍊

data.name: Z125
data.value: 你找到 火焰之鍊

data.name: Z126
data.value: 你找到 土靈手套

data.name: Z127
data.value: 你找到 海洋之鍊

data.name: Z128
data.value: 你找到 藥水(中)

data.name: Z129
data.value: 你找到 尖刺之鍊

data.name: Z130
data.value: 你找到 小偷之戒

data.name: Z131
data.value: 你找到 戰鬥領主之戒

data.name: Z132
data.value: 你找到 2000 黃金 和 戰鬥領主之戒

data.name: Z133
data.value: 你找到了怪獸!

data.name: Z134
data.value: 拜託請救救我們! 我的朋友還在城堡裡面. 不知道哪來的怪獸,你有武器吧?

data.name: Z135
data.value: 拜託救救我吧!

data.name: Z136
data.value: 謝謝你救了我!!我以為我死定了....

data.name: Z137
data.value: 喔! 我點忘記了. 有個神祕男子走向了塔頂

data.name: Z138
data.value: 我害怕他也在找神器... 我想要去找我朋友了, 她因該很害怕現在. 謝謝你

data.name: Z139
data.value: 我才不相信你! 你還記得之前在塔前面?

data.name: Z140
data.value: 你救了我! 我不會讓你離開我.

data.name: Z141
data.value: 我後來就沒見到你了...恩,你知道那天發生了什嗎?

data.name: Z142
data.value: 感謝你! 我永遠都會記得你對我做的事情!

data.name: Z143
data.value: 我永遠都虧欠你

data.name: Z144
data.value: 你選擇了 空箱子

data.name: Z145
data.value: 你選擇了 錯誤的箱子

data.name: Z147
data.value: 你找到了黃金

data.name: Z148
data.value: 哇 有東西跑進我的箱子!!

data.name: Z149
data.value: 每次我要拿我的金子的時候,它們總是跑來跑去.

data.name: Z150
data.value: 或許你有辦法找出金子在哪個箱子裡.

data.name: Z151
data.value: 好眼力! 謝謝你幫我找到黃金,請收下這個禮物

data.name: Z152
data.value: 現在我的黃金都消失了!

data.name: Z153
data.value: 不客氣!

data.name: Z154
data.value: 不過還是謝謝你, 我有感覺可能是幽靈!

data.name: Z155
data.value: 請收下這酬勞

data.name: Z156
data.value: 真感謝你, 我的金子都回來了!

data.name: Z157
data.value: 我現在該怎麼辦?我的金子都不見了!

data.name: Z158
data.value: 感謝你驅趕了這些幽靈

data.name: Z159
data.value: 請選擇一個箱子裡面有黃金的

data.name: Z160
data.value: 拜託, 請幫我們淨化圖書館. 大俠

data.name: Z161
data.value: 謝謝你幫我們淨化了圖書館. 大俠

data.name: Z162
data.value: 很抱歉之前的事, 我因該多注意點.

data.name: Z163
data.value: 感謝你淨化了圖書館. 歡迎你再來! 我的朋友.

data.name: Z164
data.value: 我是圖書館館長, 我不知道為什麼這裡會變成這樣.但是你要去清理吧?是吧?

data.name: Z165
data.value: 看吧, 你不是魔法師, 你一定會被卡在那邊的. 我們魔法師有魔法通道.它幫助我們穿梭在圖書館

data.name: Z166
data.value: 這跟你找到這個城市的方法相似, 你一定要先找到通道先!

data.name: Z167
data.value: 所以當你找不到路的時候,讓書來引導你正確的方向

data.name: Z168
data.value: 這全部都是因螳螂? 早知道我就因該多注意Billy一點

data.name: Z169
data.value: 他喜歡閱讀有關於怪物的書. 他遲早會招喚出怪物.

data.name: Z170
data.value: 嗯..感謝你拯救了我們的圖書館. 我不期待你能整裡所有的雜亂. 我想我會找到方法.當我回來的時候

data.name: Z171
data.value: 箱子無法開啟!

data.name: Z172
data.value: 為了要淨化圖書館. 你一定要摧毀源頭

data.name: Z173
data.value: 祝你幸運, 年輕人

data.name: Z174
data.value: 你必須去找雪村裡的鐵匠

data.name: Z175
data.value: 你需要找到Gargas. 我想他須重灌你的Lacuna Reaver. 這是個好消息

data.name: Z176
data.value: 我也恢復記憶了.我叔叔Arlan 計畫要喚醒 Mal'ticar

data.name: Z177
data.value: 有任何辦法我們可以阻止他嗎?

data.name: Z178
data.value: 蛤? 你確定嗎? Arlan是怎麼知道儀式的?

data.name: Z179
data.value: 我把所有的文本都銷毀了.

data.name: Z180
data.value: 他怎麼會知道已經不重要了.我必須要阻止他!

data.name: Z181
data.value: 儀式的最後一段一定要在 Verithus 城堡

data.name: Z183
data.value: 我會招集一些法術師,然後我們在Ellaethia的最南端集合

data.name: Z184
data.value: 快! 我們沒有時間可以浪費了!

data.name: Z185
data.value: 快到最南端.我會追上你們的

data.name: Z186
data.value: 不用當心我們,年輕人.你需要全力阻止你叔叔. 不太遲了

data.name: Z188
data.value: 啊~ 我不知道!

data.name: Z189
data.value: 我找如何打開箱子的指南了, 但是我看不懂. 天阿...我永遠都無法打開它

data.name: Z190
data.value: 我知道了 2 5 4 1 3! 就是這五個箱子!

data.name: Z191

data.value: 你想用劍來跟商店交易嗎?

data.name: Z394
data.value: 哇.你有把不錯的劍, 我想你最好當一個乖女孩, 然後把劍拿給我.

data.name: Z395
data.value: 你不會想要引起大家的注意!

data.name: Z396
data.value: 我是最後一間商店還開著. 你最好快點回來. 如果你知道什麼是對你好了話.

data.name: Z397
data.value: 你在威脅我嗎?

data.name: Z398
data.value: 你最好再仔細想想. 在我傷害你之前.

data.name: Z399
data.value: 你在不停止. 我不知道會發生什麼事.

data.name: Z400
data.value: 嘿嘿嘿, 你最好有這麼厲害.

data.name: Z401
data.value: 我不想傷害這漂亮的臉蛋, 但是需要有人給你一個教訓.

data.name: Z402
data.value: 我好像把他擊倒了..我們最好快走

data.name: Z403
data.value: 哇, Nathan 一定會很喜歡這個! 我想我會拿這個.

data.name: Z404
data.value: 我將會離開顯示劍,反正他是個垃圾. 而且我不喜歡這樣的感覺好像我偷了他的樣子.

data.name: Z405
data.value: Cara 已收到 Nathan 的禮物.

data.name: Z406
data.value: He's still knocked out. I better get back to Nathan before this guy comes to his senses.

data.name: Z407
data.value: 唉! 把他趕走! 別人他傷害我!

data.name: Z408
data.value: 給你一些建議....

data.name: Z409
data.value: 不要惹他生氣, 如果你還想要繼續有健康的身體

data.name: Z410
data.value: 嘿..年輕小夥子.如果你想要買東西的話. 很抱歉我們已經打烊了..

data.name: Z411
data.value: 我只是在等誰來買我的攤位.然後永遠離開這裡!

data.name: Z412
data.value: 每個人都有欠豪宅主人錢, 對我來說這還是太超過了一點.

data.name: Z413
data.value: 所以有些人雇用我保留這個位子, 直到他們找到想做的事.

data.name: Z414
data.value: 這是不是在抱怨, 我就是沒事做

data.name: Z415
data.value: 我們老闆說你會來看我的商品, 你有想要買些什麼嗎?

data.name: Z416
data.value: 哈囉! 你好嗎? 我......這裡什麼事情都沒發生

data.name: Z417
data.value: 啊啊啊啊~

data.name: Z418
data.value: 什麼? 嗯. 我這裡有別人的錢包..

data.name: Z419
data.value: 別看這我!

data.name: Z420
data.value: Ack! How did you find me! Did the mimbies tell you where I was?

data.name: Z421
data.value: 沒有人相信我, 他們一定就在這附近吧.搞不好是他們偷了我的皮夾.

data.name: Z422
data.value: 等一下! 如果我有皮夾的話, 那他們就不會有了

data.name: Z423
data.value: 看這邊!

data.name: Z424
data.value: 老鼠! 我就知道我因該把它藏在床下!

data.name: Z425
data.value: 嘿! 你還記得我麼第一次見面的時候嗎? 那真是個美好的一天. 我們還一玩duck duck goose呢!

data.name: Z426
data.value: 為什麼他叫做duck duck gooes? 我知道當夜晚的時候鴨子牙齒會變長 然後變成怪物.

data.name: Z427
data.value: 喔 對,那我要趕快逃走才是

data.name: Z428
data.value: 掰掰我也跑了.

data.name: Z429
data.value: 哇! 我記得我之前見過妳!你是那個....

data.name: Z431
data.value: 喔對了! 那個有頭髮的人

data.name: Z432
data.value: 拿去,這個皮夾. 我忘記我拿這個要做什麼了.再見了 我的朋友!

data.name: Z433
data.value: 這個豪宅的主人是個壞人, 他只給我食物. 我不需要食物,我需要的事錢!

data.name: Z434
data.value: 你可以給我一些黃金嗎?

data.name: Z435
data.value: 你救跟豪宅主人一樣可惡.當你對我感到抱歉的時候再回來吧!

data.name: Z436
data.value: 嗯...妳可以給我481金嗎?

data.name: Z437
data.value: 我想我因該會在那開一間店, 我相信北方是個不錯的地方.

data.name: Z438
data.value: 如果妳已經開始感到抱歉, 把金塊留下. 你知道你因該現在就給我.

data.name: Z439
data.value: 真的嗎? 待會見..或許. 感謝你做了對的事

data.name: Z440
data.value: 哈. 你就跟我ㄧ樣窮嘛. 當你有錢的時候再回來吧!

data.name: Z441
data.value: 嘿! 有是你.真的很謝謝, 我已經開了一家戒指店. 想要看一下我的商品嗎?

data.name: Z442
data.value: Oh... well are you going to give me 480 gold then?

data.name: Z443
data.value: *Sigh*... I guess I'll never live life to the fullest. I'll never be able to fulfill my dreams.

data.name: Z444
data.value: Wow! It's you again. I just knew I'd see you again, that's why I left without saying anything before.

data.name: Z445
data.value: You made me rich, here, take this for free. Thanks for the help! I am a changed man now.

data.name: Z446
data.value: I sure do fancy the rich life, it's quite spectacular indeed. My chaps are starting a new store back at my home.

data.name: Z447
data.value: I say, you should scuttle your way over there now. This conversation has been quite pleasant, hmm, yes, pleasant indeed. Good day, chum!

data.name: Z448
data.value: Sorry, sir, but all my merchandise is sold out, except for this one bag of seeds.

data.name: Z449
data.value: These seeds are very rare and are rumored to grow into a plant with magical properties.

data.name: Z450
data.value: 這些種子是非常稀有的. 有謠言說他們會長程有魔法的植物

data.name: Z451
data.value: I'll sell them to you for

data.name: Z452
data.value: 真的嗎? 謝謝你!

data.name: Z453
data.value: Oh well, I guess I'm still stuck with them then.

data.name: Z454
data.value: 抱歉 我已經賣光了.謝謝您的光顧

data.name: Z455
data.value: 喔..看起來你沒有足夠的錢

data.name: Z456
data.value: 你收到了一包稀有的種子

data.name: Z457
data.value: 哈囉, 你想要買這個項鍊嗎? 這是個真的不錯的東西

data.name: Z458
data.value: 很榮幸跟你交易 希望能在見到你!

data.name: Z459
data.value: 這個價值會直到我打烊. 如果改變主意的話歡迎再來!

data.name: Z460
data.value: 抱歉. 我晚上就打烊了. 請明天再來.

data.name: Z461
data.value: Cara 收到一條項鍊.

data.name: Z462
data.value: 這裡是你的鐮刀.正如你可以清楚地看到,我的技術遠遠超過其他兩位

data.name: Z463
data.value: I see the blacksmith that repaired your sorry excuse for a weapon sent you over here to gloat.

data.name: Z464
data.value: 我沒有時間理你.出去!

data.name: Z465
data.value: 所以你的鐮刀壞了? 然後你現在拿來過來給我修? 是這樣嗎?

data.name: Z466
data.value: 嗯..天下沒有便宜的好貨

data.name: Z467
data.value: 我會幫你修的

data.name: Z468
data.value: 明天就會好.你現在可以出去了.我已經厭倦你的臉了.

data.name: Z469
data.value: 對你來講是太貴了嗎?

data.name: Z470
data.value: 真是太糟了.我不跟別人談判的. 尤其是你!

data.name: Z471
data.value: 你是想捉弄我嘛小朋友?等你有錢的時候再來!

data.name: Z472
data.value: 我不喜歡重複講同樣的話小朋友! 明才會好!

data.name: Z473
data.value: 又是你?

data.name: Z474
data.value: 你已經沒有什麼東西好修的了. 不要再浪費我的時間了!

data.name: Z475
data.value: 哈囉小姐.有什我可以幫你的?

data.name: Z476
data.value: 你想要用刮鬍刀來跟我交易?

data.name: Z477
data.value: 所以你是想要用刮鬍刀來交換我的商品?

data.name: Z478
data.value: 我的鬍子是有什麼問題嘛? 對我沒什麼吸引力

data.name: Z479
data.value: 嗯..我是有把顯示劍.但是好像沒有人想要.

data.name: Z480
data.value: 事實上武器的需求已經不像以前那麼多了

data.name: Z481
data.value: How about we trade your trimmer for my sword?

data.name: Z482
data.value: 沒有.嗯? 好吧我快打烊了所以如果想改變心意的話要快

data.name: Z483
data.value: Cara收到了顯示之劍.

data.name: Z484
data.value: 感謝你的修剪.我想女士一定會映像深刻

data.name: Z485
data.value: 你找到 招換之戒

data.name: Z486
data.value: 你找到 崇拜之戒

data.name: Z487
data.value: 你找到 炫耀之戒

data.name: Z488
data.value: 你找到 聖人之戒

data.name: Z489
data.value: 你找到 後院鑰駛

data.name: Z490
data.value: 嘿..你想要玩個遊戲嘛?

data.name: Z491
data.value: 好.遊戲就是.我會把寶物放在我旁邊的箱子

data.name: Z492
data.value: 然後你必須要在箱子停止移動的時候選出有寶物的那個箱子

data.name: Z493
data.value: 如果你第一次就找到寶藏.寶藏就是你了

data.name: Z495
data.value: 你輸了.

data.name: Z496
data.value: 如果你敢變主意的話再回來吧

data.name: Z497
data.value: 你選了 空的箱子

data.name: Z498
data.value: 你找到 暗影突襲之戒

data.name: Z499
data.value: 哇..沒想到你可以找到正確的箱子.我以為你瞎了

data.name: Z500
data.value: 抱歉.但你只能猜一次

data.name: Z501
data.value: 你似乎有個強大的力量在你體內. 不要讓它控制了你

data.name: Z502
data.value: 你有聽過聖氣嘛?

data.name: Z503
data.value: When a mage feels they have been wronged by a non-magic user, they typically make them a hallow.

data.name: Z504
data.value: When a mage makes a hallow they take away one of their victims' five senses. The sense that they take away is decided by how badly the mage was wronged.

data.name: Z505
data.value: The lesser senses, like touch, taste, and smell, are for minor offenses. A mage will only take hearing or sight if they feel greatly wronged.

data.name: Z506
data.value: The moles are asleep for the night. Try coming back in the morning.

data.name: Z507
data.value: Celindar is dangerous at night. Sleep walking is common in us mages and sometimes we leave our homes.

data.name: Z508
data.value: You would be amazed to see what can happen when you're confronted by a sleep walking mage. It gets ugly.

data.name: Z509
data.value: You caused quite a ruckus when you and your friends showed up here. Don't try to start anything. I say this for your own good.

data.name: Z510
data.value: 走開!

data.name: Z511
data.value: 你找到 補藥(大) X3

data.name: Z512
data.value: 你找到 補藥(大)X4

data.name: Z513
data.value: 等一下!

data.name: Z514
data.value: 你是想質疑我的身分是嘛?

data.name: Z515
data.value: 我不能讓你獨自離開.你還沒有完全康復

data.name: Z516
data.value: 我要加入你.你最好不要說不.

data.name: Z517
data.value: Cara 加入了你的隊伍

data.name: Z518
data.value: 搶劫這個村子因該比想像中的簡單!

data.name: Z519
data.value: 恩阿.唯一能夠阻擋我們的是幾個懦弱的警衛

data.name: Z520
data.value: 嘿! 看這個傢伙. 他居然想躲在樹後面

data.name: Z521
data.value: 走!去抓住他!

data.name: Z522
data.value: 天啊.村莊正被土匪襲擊..我們該怎麼做.......

data.name: Z523
data.value: 先聲對不起.我們不能讓你通過. 這是為了你的安全

data.name: Z524
data.value: 由於目前這附近盜賊增加. 城鎮現在已經關閉.

data.name: Z525
data.value: 喔! 你終於醒來了. 別害怕你在這裡很安全. 我們在森林裡找到你的.

data.name: Z526
data.value: 我的名子叫做Cara, 我已經照顧你有一陣子了. 我想你因該要休息一下別太緊張.

data.name: Z527
data.value: 那你叫什麼名子呢?

data.name: Z528
data.value: 你真得不記得我了?

data.name: Z529
data.value: 你記得你從哪裡來和怎麼受傷或是任何事情嗎?

data.name: Z530
data.value: 真糟糕...

data.name: Z531
data.value: 嗯.試著去城裡走走吧. 人們都蠻好的.你因該見見他們. 他們也會很想見到你的

data.name: Z532
data.value: 希望清晰的空氣能幫助喚醒你的記憶.

data.name: Z533
data.value: 如果你想要的話可以去箱子裡拿一些補藥. 或許會派上用場

data.name: Z534
data.value: 欸.在你離開之前我爸希望你把這把練習之劍帶在身上. 當你麻煩的時候能派上用場

data.name: Z535
data.value: 嗯.你看起來已經準備好了.就不打擾你了. 小心安全

data.name: Z536
data.value: 你收到 勇氣之戒 和 500 黃金

data.name: Z537
data.value: ...然後我說. 這不是蘑菇, 這是我老婆! 呵呵呵呵!

data.name: Z538
data.value: 爸爸! 你看那個帥氣的年輕人!

data.name: Z539
data.value: 現在! 就是現在Cara. 他需要我們的幫忙和熱情款待. 抓住他的腿,讓他在我們房間休息

data.name: Z540
data.value: 我會看住他.

data.name: Z541
data.value: ... To make sure he's okay, and he stays healthy and stuff...

data.name: Z542
data.value: Cara, 這是?

data.name: Z543
data.value: 一個了不起的想法!

data.name: Z544
data.value: 誰來幫我們! 這裡太多敵人了

data.name: Z545
data.value: 真高興見到你 Cara. 你也是...

data.name: Z546
data.value: 他的名子是 Nathan, 父親.他已經想起一些事情了.至從我門離開城鎮後發生了什麼事?

data.name: Z547
data.value: 冷靜. 這裡有些盜賊足跡在蘑菇森林

data.name: Z548
data.value: 根據謠言. 王盜賊在此設立營區

data.name: Z549
data.value: 我已經警告所有村民避開這個時段.

data.name: Z550
data.value: 所以你父親是市長嘛?他一定也不錯的東西

data.name: Z551
data.value: 你想都別想!

data.name: Z552
data.value: 啦啦啦

data.name: Z553
data.value: 我們終於到這裡了

data.name: Z554
data.value: 看起來我們不是唯一個在找神器的人. 你會覺得我們太晚?

data.name: Z555
data.value: 屍體還是溫的.他們才剛死沒多久. 如果我們快一點或許能救一些人

data.name: Z556
data.value: 但是別忘了神器還是我們第一優先. 走吧!

data.name: Z557
data.value: 救命! 怪獸正在攻擊城堡!

data.name: Z558
data.value: 啊啊~~

data.name: Z559
data.value: 吧啦啦啦~~

data.name: Z560
data.value: 喀拉~

data.name: Z561
data.value: 管理員!

data.name: Z562
data.value: 他死了..

data.name: Z563
data.value: 但..誰殺了他? 然後神器在哪?

data.name: Z564
data.value: 什麼...

data.name: Z565
data.value: 發什麼事了?

data.name: Z566
data.value: 嘿嘿嘿嘿..你這個傻瓜

data.name: Z567
data.value: 你是誰? 來啊! 懦夫!

data.name: Z568
data.value: 喔.. Nathan... 你正的以為你能打敗我? 你的朋友已經死了, Nathan.

data.name: Z569
data.value: 真是個天真的小孩.

data.name: Z570
data.value: 廢話說夠了? 讓我看看你的本事吧.現在

data.name: Z571
data.value: 呵呵...就如你所願, 小朋友

data.name: Z572
data.value: 我並沒有想到你會在這裡, Nathan, 但是不重要. 準備去天堂找你朋友吧!

data.name: Z573
data.value: 是時候讓你劍是我的力量了!

data.name: Z574
data.value: 或許你有辦法能想出如何得到我的黃金

data.name: Z575
data.value: 所以,你淨化了圖書館, 謝謝你年輕人.你可以走了

data.name: Z576
data.value: 等一下! 你不是說你要告訴我們一些重要的事情?

data.name: Z577
data.value: 重要的事情?

data.name: Z578
data.value: 喔對了.我想起來了

data.name: Z579
data.value: 你們一定要原諒我, 我的記憶已經沒有以前好了

data.name: Z580
data.value: 如果我只有20歲我..

data.name: Z581
data.value: 你真是老頑固, 講重點. 老頭

data.name: Z582
data.value: 就如你所願.重要..

data.name: Z584
data.value: 恩對了. 就是這個. 傳奇Lacuna的血

data.name: Z585
data.value: 這些劍的故事.一個久到讓人遺忘的故事.當兩個最大的洲Ellaethia和Agora,其中一個

data.name: Z586
data.value: 在那段時間魔法筆現今更普遍.

data.name: Z587
data.value: 每個人都擁有能力控制魔法.而且不是少數

data.name: Z588
data.value: 不間斷的練習魔法.而且常被濫用

data.name: Z589
data.value: 過度的使用魔法,引來了深淵理的惡魔.

data.name: Z590
data.value: 惡魔的名子叫做 Mal'ticar.

data.name: Z591
data.value: 這惡毒的惡魔可望魔法能量

data.name: Z592
data.value: 他會一個城鎮一個城鎮的尋找新的麼法能量, 然後摧毀一切.

data.name: Z593
data.value: 對權力的渴望永遠沒有滿足的一天

data.name: Z594
data.value: 在絕望中.南部大陸的人企圖逃往北部尋求庇護

data.name: Z595
data.value: 結合了所有的力量,施法把大陸切成了兩半

data.name: Z596
data.value: 他們創造了一個天然的海洋隔開了Mal'ticar和他們的所在地

data.name: Z597
data.value: 那些不夠幸運的人就被困在南大陸和Mal'ticar

data.name: Z598
data.value: 人們被迫要團結起來對抗惡魔.

data.name: Z599
data.value: 南大陸的人們. 把他們所有魔法能量注入近幾把劍裡

data.name: Z600
data.value: 這些劍有能量可以切斷任何東西.

data.name: Z601
data.value: 他們被稱做Lacuna之刀

data.name: Z602
data.value: 而那些被選上要揮動Lacuna之刀的被稱做lacuna掠奪者

data.name: Z603
data.value: 這些掠奪者用它們的劍把世界切開, 然後把Mal'ticar封印在另一個空間.

data.name: Z604
data.value: 過了幾千年以後.這暗黑的時代以被人們遺忘.

data.name: Z605
data.value: Lacuna 之刀已經永遠消失

data.name: Z606
data.value: 直到現在

data.name: Z607
data.value: Nathan,你所帶的劍就是傳說的Lacuna之一.

data.name: Z608
data.value: 記住這個名子, Nathan. 他可以幫你解開這把劍的真正淺能.

data.name: Z609
data.value: 我是唯一存活知道這把劍的力量的人.

data.name: Z610
data.value: 而且這個村莊只有一個人可以教你這個力量.可以扯開時空.

data.name: Z611
data.value: 那我們開始吧. 我準備好了

data.name: Z612
data.value: 不是你笨蛋! ˙他在跟Nathan說. 你沒聽清楚.

data.name: Z613
data.value: I drift in an' out.

data.name: Z614
data.value: Nathan! 年輕的掠奪者. 你準好要學Lacuna時空之門

data.name: Z615
data.value: 我們走!

data.name: Z616
data.value: 你已經學會新的法術-Lacuna時空之術.他可以帶你去過妳以前去過的所有地方.

data.name: Z617
data.value: 這個法術耗費我很多力量. 我現在一定要休息. 小心安全旅行者.

data.name: Z618
data.value: 喔..還有一件事情.

data.name: Z619
data.value: 拜託, 不要再說了.

data.name: Z620
data.value: Lacuna之刀隱藏力量在刀柄. 這就是他可以開啟時空之門的秘密.

data.name: Z621
data.value: 然而他真正的力量藏在刀中

data.name: Z622
data.value: 我可以看得出來刀片的部分已經受損和維修過. 其實他已經消失很多力量.

data.name: Z623
data.value: 你一定要雪地村莊找工匠大師

data.name: Z624
data.value: 只有那位工匠大師能把你的劍恢復原形

data.name: Z625
data.value: 這是我的榮幸見到你, 小心安全.

data.name: Z626
data.value: Nathan, 不是只有你這麼忠心, 但你是已經是個傳奇了. 你真帥!

data.name: Z627
data.value: 嗯..不是..我意思是..太棒了!

data.name: Z628
data.value: 我不了解你們兩個人, 但我覺得因該不難.

data.name: Z629
data.value: 準備好!

data.name: Z630
data.value: Nathan,我們因該跟 Endor說我已經把圖書館淨化了.

data.name: Z631
data.value: 你是怎麼找到我的?

data.name: Z632
data.value: 你怎麼可能找的到這裡

data.name: Z633
data.value: 我不知道你們再說什麼,也不知道你是誰. 就像你們看到的我是個瞎子.

data.name: Z634
data.value: 我知道. 我就是那個讓你瞎了的人. 笨蛋.

data.name: Z635
data.value: 所以你是那個我們看到逃走的人, 是嘛?

data.name: Z636
data.value: 我想那個小偷沒有把全部的故事告訴你

data.name: Z637
data.value: 我詛咒他失明, 因為他想偷我的東西

data.name: Z638
data.value: 胡說! 他在說謊!

data.name: Z639
data.value: 省了吧! 你知道我再說什麼!

data.name: Z640
data.value: 嗯, 我想我因該要感謝你. 你的詛咒好像給了我什麼能力讓我在戰鬥中保護自己.

data.name: Z641
data.value: 否則我想我會死在戰鬥中

data.name: Z642
data.value: 你再說什麼?!

data.name: Z643
data.value: 我以為你會死在森林裡. 我的詛咒就是讓你瞎了. 沒有別的了!

data.name: Z644
data.value: 看這樣! 讓我們結束我們本來要在森林的事吧!

data.name: Z645
data.value: 等一下!!

data.name: Z646
data.value: 這是真的嘛?

data.name: Z647
data.value: By the stars, it is!

data.name: Z648
data.value: 兒子, 你知道是什麼劍嘛?

data.name: Z649
data.value: 你手上所拿的是傳奇的 Lacuna 之刀.

data.name: Z650
data.value: 那是個神話! 沒有人會相信那些老人的故事.

data.name: Z651
data.value: 這不再是個傳說! 這個年輕人在這裡已經證明了一切!

data.name: Z652
data.value: 刀柄上的波動是確鑿無誤, 而且我可以看出來這有骨沉睡的力量在裡面!

data.name: Z653
data.value: 這可以確定的是他是其中一把Lacuna之刀.

data.name: Z654
data.value: 我不相信.毫無疑問的這是把普通的劍. 從一個無辜的人偷來的.

data.name: Z655
data.value: 這些人是騙子, Endor!

data.name: Z656
data.value: 不知怎樣他們知道了這個城市的秘密. 然後計畫把我所擁優的東西都偷走.

data.name: Z657
data.value: 這不是真的! 我只是普通的旅行者為了找到我們朋友Nathan的身分. 你看他失去了他的記憶當..

data.name: Z658
data.value: 不要聽他們的!

data.name: Z659
data.value: 我看我們現在就把他們殺了.我們不能讓他們告訴別人我們....

data.name: Z660
data.value: 夠了, Ruith!

data.name: Z661
data.value: 我們會停止這樣的對話. 我們沒有惡意...旅行者

data.name: Z662
data.value: 不過, 我蠻好奇你們怎麼找到我們躲藏的地方

data.name: Z663
data.value: 先生, 我們只是跟著盲人朋友到這裡的

data.name: Z664
data.value: 嗯.. 無意中偶然發現你的秘密入口。

data.name: Z665
data.value: 偶然的發現?嗯....

data.name: Z666
data.value: 非常可疑

data.name: Z667
data.value: 你還有什麼東西想加在他的故事嗎? 年輕人

data.name: Z668
data.value: 嗯..事實上...

data.name: Z669
data.value: 我有強烈的感覺.有些東西在崖面後面

data.name: Z670
data.value: 我沒辦法解釋.就好像我被人推到這裡

data.name: Z671
data.value: 我之前沒有說是因為我覺得這樣聽起來有點白癡

data.name: Z672
data.value: 這聽起來並不白癡. 事實上,還蠻讓人印相深刻的!

data.name: Z673
data.value: 你這種感覺是最有天賦的法師當他們靠近這裡才會有的感覺

data.name: Z674
data.value: 你是說我是個法師?

data.name: Z675
data.value: 但是我從來沒有學過任何魔法.

data.name: Z676
data.value: 我想我能解釋這個.

data.name: Z677
data.value: 有人出生後就會有一股魔法沉睡在他們的身體裡面.

data.name: Z678
data.value: 這些稀有的人甚至一生都不知道他們擁有這種力量.

data.name: Z679
data.value: 直到必要的時候才能喚醒它.

data.name: Z680
data.value: 生存, 以你看來.

data.name: Z681
data.value: 當你在森林被我盲目的時候, 是你最絕望的狀態

data.name: Z682
data.value: 這一定是ㄧ種催化劑

data.name: Z683
data.value: 這大概就是WILL 為什麼能打這麼好的原因

data.name: Z684
data.value: 沒錯, 年輕的治癒師

data.name: Z685
data.value: Hmmm, What are the odds of finding a latent mage traveling with a Lacuna Reaver?

data.name: Z686
data.value: 時空掠奪者

data.name: Z687
data.value: Endor! Endor! 救命!

data.name: Z688
data.value: 兒子冷靜點. 發生什麼事了?

data.name: Z689
data.value: 一個學生的實驗發生了可怕的錯誤!

data.name: Z690
data.value: 然後現在圖書館...

data.name: Z691
data.value: 群魔!!

data.name: Z692
data.value: 大家都逃出圖書了嗎?

data.name: Z693
data.value: 是的

data.name: Z694
data.value: 我要怎麼辦? 我們該怎麼辦?

data.name: Z695
data.value: 那裡全部都是怪獸.

data.name: Z696
data.value: Endor,我們去幫助他們吧. 我想我們能夠處理這件事

data.name: Z697
data.value: 嗯..就聽你的吧. 有你的幫忙就太好了.

data.name: Z698
data.value: Endor! 這樣好嗎?讓這些陌生人進入我們神聖的寶庫?

data.name: Z699
data.value: Ruith,如果你保持存疑, 那你還有什麼更好的辦法來證明他們有問題. 我是相信他們的.

data.name: Z700
data.value: 年輕人, 如果你成功的消除了那些怪物, 來找我.

data.name: Z701
data.value: 我會以我的知識來報答你們, 或許對你們在找的東西有幫助.

data.name: Z702
data.value: 先生謝謝你, 我們不會讓你失望的.

data.name: Z703
data.value: Nathan,我也很擔心他.

data.name: Z704
data.value: 這是非常不健康的, 把自己鎖在固執裡面. 來保住自己的公司.

data.name: Z705
data.value: 答應我你不會變成那樣.

data.name: Z706
data.value: Nathan! 你又昏倒了. 你有想到些什麼嗎?

data.name: Z707
data.value: Nathan, 如果你還可以的話, 我想們因該要繼續前進. 我感覺到前方有股干擾來至書櫃.

data.name: Z708
data.value: 這大概就是為什麼會有這些異常的活動的原因

data.name: Z709
data.value: 他看起來沒這麼厲害.

data.name: Z710
data.value: 他來了.小心, Nathan!

data.name: Z711
data.value: 翻翻!? 你們為什麼要傷害他? 他從來不傷害別人的.

data.name: Z712
data.value: 他看起來並不壞.

data.name: Z713
data.value: 喔當然,你看它只是個小熊. 你完全搞錯了.

data.name: Z714
data.value: 阿唷, 我只是想要鼓勵她一下.

data.name: Z715
data.value: 翻翻!? 他沒事! 他說你們是厲害的戰士. 他很樂意幫助你們如果有需要的話

data.name: Z716
data.value: 翻翻說你找的張只能夠在你危急的情況下招喚他.

data.name: Z717
data.value: 跟我的魔法類型好像. 我會把這張紙放進我的書裡. 他是怎麼知道危機的意思?

data.name: Z718
data.value: 翻翻跟我說她很聰明的. 我要去幫他找醫生了,我不希望他一直流血.

data.name: Z719
data.value: 我覺得他好奇怪. 但是我不想再被他的玩具或是更多家具攻擊.

data.name: Z720
data.value: 我們趕快離開這裡吧.

data.name: Z721
data.value: ....真不像話! 外人是不允許進入Celindar! 這是大家都知道的事!

data.name: Z722
data.value: Ruith, 你自己需要冷靜一下. 他們不是ㄧ般的外人. 他們背負了很重要的命運.

data.name: Z723
data.value: 你必須幫他們盡你所有的力量.

data.name: Z724
data.value: Haven't you seen that theif?! He's scum. He never should have made it out of that forest.

data.name: Z725
data.value: 我想你小看它了. 他淺藏了個偉大的力量

data.name: Z726
data.value: 你只是需要....

data.name: Z727
data.value: 等一下, 我覺得有些東西在哪裡.

data.name: Z728
data.value: 它只是個崖面.我想你的技能沒辦法在任何地方使用WILL.

data.name: Z729
data.value: 讓我很快的看一下.

data.name: Z730
data.value: 我改決這裡怪怪的. 你們怎麼可能沒感覺.

data.name: Z731
data.value: 我越來越熱了...

data.name: Z732
data.value: 回來啦 Will! 讓 Nathan決定吧. 它能解決所有問題.

data.name: Z733
data.value: Will! 別動, 我來了!

data.name: Z734
data.value: 你怎麼知道我們要去哪裡? 這邊一片漆黑!

data.name: Z735
data.value: 在我的經驗裡總是漆黑的! 閉上嘴跟我來.

data.name: Z736
data.value: 這種感覺真奇怪. 我感覺好像顛倒了

data.name: Z737
data.value: 欸, 我不是叫你閉嘴嗎?

data.name: Z738
data.value: 我知道你的感覺. 有些問題.

data.name: Z739
data.value: 這邊,跟我來!

data.name: Z740
data.value: 真奇怪. 我看到一堆從來沒見過東西在這個洞穴裡面.

data.name: Z741
data.value: 這個城裡圍著這些魔法燈籠, 他們一定有他們的功用.

data.name: Z742
data.value: 現在是我報仇的時候了, 那個笨蛋法師 Ruith.

data.name: Z743
data.value: 我會讓他後悔那天把我的所有拿走

data.name: Z744
data.value: 你事認真的嗎?

data.name: Z745
data.value: We should give her a piece of our mind! Making us go into the library like that, just to treat us with disrespect!

data.name: Z746
data.value: 這裡發生了什麼事?

data.name: Z747
data.value: 或許在裡面的人能幫助我們

data.name: Z748
data.value: 這裡真髒.

data.name: Z749
data.value: Nathan,看..鐵砧!

data.name: Z750
data.value: 工匠一定住在這裡.

data.name: Z751
data.value: 我有點擔心發生了什麼事

data.name: Z752
data.value: 我感覺這裡有人擁有強大的力量.

data.name: Z753
data.value: 這裡因該有什麼都西在跟鐵匠對抗.

data.name: Z754
data.value: 你是說鐵匠可能被綁架了?

data.name: Z755
data.value: 這是有可能的

data.name: Z756
data.value: 我們因該去找他

data.name: Z757
data.value: 他可能為是我們唯一的機會, 把 Nathan的劍修好.

data.name: Z758
data.value: 或許我們因把這個工作交給我哥

data.name: Z759
data.value: 不能因為 Nathan自己的疏失就解除他的任務, 這是他的夢想.

data.name: Z760
data.value: 我想你說的對,我只是怕 Nathan 會犯可怕的錯誤. 我哥比Nathan更可靠.

data.name: Z761
data.value: Nathan會在當中學習. 我想當你年輕的時候也是一樣吧.

data.name: Z762
data.value: 也是. 這是學習唯一的方法. 我想我哥已經太老去承擔這件事了

data.name: Z763
data.value: 此外, 他的故直讓他很忙碌....

data.name: Z764
data.value: 我都忘了上ㄧ次他離開這項研究.

data.name: Z765
data.value: 這是結論. Nathan. 生唯一位時空掠奪者, Verithus的命運就交給你了

data.name: Z766
data.value: Nathan, 我也很擔心他

data.name: Z767
data.value: 他這樣把他自己鎖起來是很不健康的

data.name: Z768
data.value: 答應我你永遠不會變成這樣.

data.name: Z769
data.value: 你現在安全了, 我們回家吧.

data.name: Z770
data.value: 謝謝你救了我

data.name: Z771
data.value: 惡魔把我綁架然強迫我製造武器給他.

data.name: Z772
data.value: 這真是太糟糕了

data.name: Z773
data.value: 我有什麼方法可以報答你嗎大善人?

data.name: Z774
data.value: 黃金! 很多很多!

data.name: Z775
data.value: 閉嘴, Will!

data.name: Z776
data.value: 不要理他, 不要給他.

data.name: Z777
data.value: 但是, 我們現在很需要你的服務..

data.name: Z778
data.value: 好的, 任何事. 我可以為你做什麼?

data.name: Z779
data.value: 我的朋友 Nathan有把非常特別的劍需要修理.

data.name: Z780
data.value: 叫時空之刀. 你有聽過媽?

data.name: Z781
data.value: 時空之刀! 怎麼可能

data.name: Z782
data.value: 所以你聽過?

data.name: Z783
data.value: 當然, 我就其中的一個鑄造的人

data.name: Z784
data.value: 怎麼可能! 有人告訴我們這是幾世紀前的東西.

data.name: Z785
data.value: 你不可能這麼老!

data.name: Z786
data.value: 很抱歉我就是.

data.name: Z787
data.value: 時空之刀對我有無法預料的影響.

data.name: Z788
data.value: 這股強大的力量讓我繼續活著.

data.name: Z789
data.value: 我上次看到這把劍的時候, 劍被送到 Verithus.

data.name: Z790
data.value: Verithus!?

data.name: Z791
data.value: Nathan! Nathan!

data.name: Z792
data.value: 你還好吧?

data.name: Z793
data.value: 你還記得其他的事情嗎?

data.name: Z794
data.value: 嗯.我都還記得.

data.name: Z795
data.value: 太棒了!

data.name: Z796
data.value: Arlan!

data.name: Z797
data.value: 我叔叔, Arlan.

data.name: Z798
data.value: 他是ㄧ位令人尊敬的人. 這裡的人都很尊敬他.

data.name: Z799
data.value: 然而, 他沉迷於所獲得的力量.

data.name: Z800
data.value: 他會把他自己鎖在房間裡, 然後研究讓自己變強.

data.name: Z801
data.value: 然後有一天,他找ㄧ個聖物.ㄧ個被禁止了幾世紀的黑暗儀式.

data.name: Z802
data.value: 我父親發現了這件事, 然後叫我去阻止他.

data.name: Z803
data.value: 我帶著兩個我最好的騎士去搜尋他鎖在的高塔裡面, 你發現我昏倒的地方.

data.name: Z804
data.value: 他殺了他們, 我差點也被殺死.

data.name: Z805
data.value: Nathan...

data.name: Z806
data.value: 儀式的手稿因該早就要被銷毀.

data.name: Z807
data.value: 那儀式是做什麼的?

data.name: Z808
data.value: 我想你一定很熟悉時空掠奪者.

data.name: Z809
data.value: 是的, ㄧ個法師名叫Endor 告訴我的.

data.name: Z810
data.value: 他就是那個送我們來找你的人.

data.name: Z811
data.value: Endor嗎?他是我的一位老朋友.

data.name: Z812
data.value: 所以,事關於什麼傳說?

data.name: Z813
data.value: 在偉大的分裂大陸後.

data.name: Z814
data.value: ㄧ些被困在 Agora 相信有辦法能阻止 Mal'ticar.

data.name: Z815
data.value: 相反的, 他們覺得最好存活的方法就是加入他們.

data.name: Z816
data.value: mal'ticar將大部分變成可怕的惡魔, 並用他們作為奴隸.

data.name: Z817

data.value: Hahaha, and here he is to prove my point. So you're here to fight me....how expected.

data.value: Prepare yourself, for you are about to face all of your flaws. You must examine yourself, and in so doing, defeat your impurities.

data.name: ZA025
data.value: 我不會聽任何人的!

data.name: ZA026
data.value: 你以為我花多少力氣招換你?

data.name: ZA027
data.value: 你怎可以不聽我的

data.name: ZA028
data.value: 嘿!

data.name: ZA029
data.value: Mal'Ticar's 的力量越來越強大了. 我們必須做些什麼.

data.name: ZA030
data.value: 世界現在就靠我們了,我們必須擊敗Mal'Ticar. 在她恢復全部力量之前

data.name: ZA031
data.value: 我們必須要迫使他回到虛空.

data.name: ZA032
data.value: Nathan我們來擊倒她!

data.name: ZA033
data.value: 笨蛋!我的力量早就超出你們的想像. 準備被粉碎吧!

data.name: ZA034
data.value: 夠了!

data.name: ZA035
data.value: 什麼?

data.name: ZA036
data.value: Will!, Cara!

data.name: ZA037
data.value: 不..又來.

data.name: ZA038
data.value: 你會得到報應的

data.name: ZA039
data.value: 你喚醒了時空之刀的新的技能

data.name: ZA040
data.value: 你已經學會時空之光

data.name: ZA041
data.value: 把 Mal'Ticar封印近虛空.永遠

data.name: ZA042
data.value: 終於結束了.

data.name: ZA043
data.value: Will...

data.name: ZA044
data.value: Cara...

data.name: ZA045
data.value: Nathan.

data.name: ZA046
data.value: Cara!

data.name: ZA047
data.value: 你們都還活著

data.name: ZA048
data.value: 但是怎麼會?我以為

data.name: ZA049
data.value: 我可以在她攻擊之前舉起盾牌.

data.name: ZA050
data.value: 她保護了我.但是爆炸還是擊昏了我.

data.name: ZA051
data.value: Mal'Ticar呢?

data.name: ZA052
data.value: 屬於他的地方. 我把他封印在虛空了.

data.name: ZA053
data.value: Nathan, 你真厲害!

data.name: ZA054
data.value: 喔.Will你沒事吧

data.name: ZA055
data.value: Will?

data.name: ZA056
data.value: Nathan, Will去哪了?

data.name: ZA058
data.value: 我沒辦法救到她.

data.name: ZA059
data.value: Nathan, 這不是你的錯.

data.name: ZA060
data.value: 你拯救了這個世界,WILL會感到很光榮的.

data.name: ZA253
data.value: Come Here, Go Anywhere!

data.name: ZA254
data.value: Who's this handsome guy?

data.name: ZA255
data.value: Well that was interesting...

data.name: ZA256
data.value: I feel like I've learned something. I don't want to kill Ruith quite as much as I did before.

data.name: ZA257
data.value: That would be a side effect from defeating your inner demons.

data.name: ZA258
data.value: You are now using logic, rather than rage and pride, to make your judgements. You still have much room to grow, but it is a start.

data.name: ZA259
data.value: Its about time someone put that stupid thief in his place.

data.name: ZA260
data.value: I would be careful if i were you. You may be next.

data.name: ZA261
data.value: I think I'd better get back to my friends. I have a lot to think about with the whole brain reconfiguration and all.

data.name: ZA262
data.value: This is a big step in realizing your true power. I am very interested to see where life takes you.

data.name: ZA263
data.value: Good luck on your journeys and farewell.

data.name: ZA264
data.value: Will has recieved Amulet of Insight

data.name: ZA265
data.value: You found Medium Tonic X3!

data.name: ZA266
data.value: You found a Ruby Ring and 125 gold!

data.name: ZA267
data.value: You found Medium Potion X3!

data.name: ZA268
data.value: Amulet of Insight

data.name: ZA269
data.value: "True strength comes from within." - Endor

data.name: ZA270
data.value: Strange girl...

data.name: ZA271
data.value: It pleases me to watch you squirm. You have fought with all your might, and still, all will end in ruin.

data.name: ZA272
data.value: As we fought my power grew. Now there is nothing you can do to stop me!

data.name: ZA273
data.value: I'm so sorry Nathan. I was blinded by the power of Mal'Ticar's magic.

data.name: ZA274
data.value: The closer I got to summoning Mal'Ticar, the stronger I became. I never knew that this would be the outcome of my efforts.

data.name: ZA275
data.value: Nathan! Listen closely. I am going to funnel all of my strength and energy into your blade.

data.name: ZA276
data.value: That should give you the power you need to send Mal'Ticar back into the void.

data.name: ZA277
data.value: What will that do to you?

data.name: ZA278
data.value: I won't survive.

data.name: ZA279
data.value: But, I must atone for what I've done. This is the only way!

data.name: ZA280
data.value: Kinda late for the heroics, but we'll take what we can get.

data.name: ZA281
data.value: Don't be so insenstive!

data.name: ZA282
data.value: There is no time to waste! We must do this now!

data.name: ZA283
data.value: Thank you Uncle.

data.name: ZA284
data.value: Hurry Nathan! Send this monster back where he came from!

data.name: ZA285
data.value: It's time to end this.

data.value: An old scythe. It has a rusty blade and a yew shaft.

data.name: ZA510
data.value: Rusty Scythe

data.name: ZA511
data.value: In the mean time take this old rusty scythe.

data.name: ZA512
data.value: Now get out of here. I'm tired of looking at your face.

data.name: ZA513
data.value: For now, take this plain armor. We can't have you guys running around here naked now can we. HA!HA!

data.name: ZA514
data.value: Plain Armor

data.name: ZA515
data.value: Plain armor. It is thin and flimsy.

data.name: ZA516
data.value: Sire!?

data.name: ZA517
data.value: I have a plan to save Agora from your uncle. I've obtained three legendary items that should guarantee my success.

data.name: ZA518
data.value: You have to stop your uncle!

data.name: ZA519
data.value: Its good to have you back sire.

data.name: ZA520
data.value: My condolences Prince Nathan. Your parents were the greatest king and queen in history.

data.name: ZA521
data.value: By the stars! Our prince has returned.

data.name: ZA522
data.value: You received a Translucent Ring and 450 gold pieces.

data.name: ZA523
data.value: You received 450 gold pieces.

data.name: ZA524
data.value: The crab summons a razor-sharp pillar below it's target.

data.name: ZA525
data.value: Soul Drain

data.name: ZA526
data.value: Drains the energy from the soul, replenishing the life of the caster and steals their strength.

data.name: ZA527
data.value: You received Earthen Gloves and 300 gold pieces.

data.name: ZA528
data.value: We shouldn't steal.

data.name: ZA529
data.value: Your game has been saved.

data.name: ZA530
data.value: A strange energy surrounds you.

data.name: ZA531
data.value: You feel rejuvinated.

data.name: ZA532
data.value: This can't be your house. A blacksmith we're looking for lives here. We think he's in trouble.

data.name: ZA533
data.value: Well then it seems you've found who you were searching for. I am your missing blacksmith.

data.name: ZA534
data.value: Ha! How is this girl supposed to be a master blacksmith?

data.name: ZA535
data.value: Why are you doing this? Are you working with Arlan?

data.name: ZA536
data.value: I am Arlan you poor, defenseless, nephew of mine. Now that I have the artifact, I can finally resurrect Mal'ticar.

data.name: ZA537
data.value: You never should have come here. You never stood a chance against me.

data.name: ZA538
data.value: My father sent me to find you after he learned your intentions. Neither of us could have imagined what you were becoming. Can't you see how this evil has twisted you?

data.name: ZA539
data.value: I have greater power than you can imagine. By summoning Mal'ticar I can join with him and finally be out from under my brother's shadow.

data.name: ZA540
data.value: You're just a pathetic shell of the the man my uncle was. My uncle was a wise and loving man. He was nothing like you.

data.name: ZA541
data.value: I have enjoyed our talk, but I have a world to conquer. Take comfort in knowing that your family will soon be joining you in the afterlife.

data.name: ZA542
data.value: You found 150 gold!

data.name: ZA543
data.value: You found a Large Tonic X3!

data.name: ZA544
data.value: Maybe, if you prove your worth, I will lend you these items so you might defeat your uncle instead.

data.name: ZA545
data.value: There are 30 hidden marks in the Forbidden Cavern to the east of our camp. There are 10 marks for three different sets. I will give you an item for each complete set of marks you find. Good luck!

data.value: You've collected all of the Green Marks! Your courage has earned you the Battle Lords Ring.

data.value: You've collected all of the Red Marks! Your guile has earned you the Battle Thief Ring.

data.name: ZA561
data.value: You've collected all of the Blue Marks! Your wisdom has earned you the Battle Mage Ring.

data.name: ZA562
data.value: You've managed to collect all the marks in the Forbidden Cavern. You truly are great warriors. I trust you will make good use of the items I've given you.

data.name: ZA563
data.value: I will use what power I have left to unblock the entrance to the Sewn bog.

data.name: ZA564
data.value: ...Down, Right, Left, Up...Down, Right, Left, Up...Down, Right...

data.name: ZA565
data.value: You found a Divine Ring!

data.name: ZA566
data.value: Starfire Ore

data.name: ZA567
data.value: An extremely rare crafting material. Few blacksmiths have the skill to make use of it.

data.name: ZA568
data.value: Blood Metal Ore

data.name: ZA569
data.value: You found Starfire Ore!

data.name: ZA570
data.value: You found Blood Metal Ore!

data.name: ZA571
data.value: Boots of Quickening

data.name: ZA572
data.value: Party gains additional walking speed. Hold down left shift key to activate.

data.name: ZA573
data.value: You found Boots of Quickening!

data.name: ZA574
data.value: Hey Jeremiah!

data.name: ZA575
data.value: What's up Franky D?

data.name: ZA576
data.value: This fella' thinks he can break into our hideout. And how many times did I tell you to stop calling me that!

data.name: ZA577
data.value: Sorry Lenny. Do you think he know about the treasure?

data.name: ZA578
data.value: He does now! He knows too much, let's kill him!

data.name: ZA579
data.value: They killed our pawns! Time for plan B.

data.name: ZA580
data.value: Wait... We have a plan B?

data.name: ZA581
data.value: ... The trees you imbecile!

data.name: ZA582
data.value: Trees!? You think trees are gonna kill these guys!? They're trees! You know what trees are right?

data.name: ZA583
data.value: Just send in the trees!

data.name: ZA584
data.value: They defeated our secret weapons! We need to send in the four elite members of the guild!

data.name: ZA585
data.value: But Gary! What if-

data.name: ZA586
data.value: That's Gary sir to you Bruno!

data.name: ZA587
data.value: Sorry. Gary sir, what if-

data.name: ZA588
data.value: Hmm, I think I like sir Gary better. Or maybe sir Gary sir!

data.name: ZA589
data.value: I like that a lot actually.

data.name: ZA590
data.value: Well we're in a bit of a predicament here I think.

data.name: ZA591
data.value: What's the problem Sam?

data.name: ZA592
data.value: Where do I begin. Most of the guild has been killed by these punks, our strongest team was killed, and now most of the ghosts are running rampant due to sudden loss of guild members.

data.name: ZA593
data.value: Our guild was taken down all because we had to protect this chest? It's not even worth dying for!

data.name: ZA594
data.value: Well we have no choice now. We're trapped now, might as well die as heroes protecting the most ancient treasure of all treasures.

data.name: ZA595
data.value: We're running out of options here. What do you suggest Antonio?

data.name: ZA596
data.value: Well we have these ghosts that we've tamed to help us out.

data.name: ZA597
data.value: We have a ghost taming division in our guild?

data.name: ZA598
data.value: Of course! Some of the guild thought our ghost hunting division was immoral, so we tame them now.

data.name: ZA599
data.value: We had a ghost hunting division in our guild? Nobody tells me nothin'. Well send them in!

data.name: ZA600
data.value: Mysterious Page

data.name: ZA601
data.value: I can't thank you enough for saving my friend. She's upstairs if you'd like to talk to her.

data.name: ZA602
data.value: Hey you're that soldier that left my friend to those monsters back at the keep. I'll never forgive you for not saving her.

data.name: ZA603
data.value: You recieved 400 gold pieces.

data.name: ZA604
data.value: So you solved my riddle! Well that was an easy one. Lets try one more.

data.name: ZA605
data.value: The bandit performs a melee attack that exposes armor, reducing defense with every strike.

data.name: ZA606
data.value: Hg. Potion

data.name: ZA607
data.value: Restores 8000 health.

data.name: ZA608
data.value: Hg. Tonic

data.name: ZA609
data.value: Restores 1000 mana.

data.name: ZA610
data.value: You received a Nature Charm!

data.name: ZA611
data.value: You found a Ruby Ring!

data.name: ZA612
data.value: gold pieces and an Obsidian Charm!

data.name: ZA613
data.value: You received a Lapiz Lazuli Ring!

data.name: ZA614
data.value: All stats + 5, HP and Mana + 200, Stam +1

data.name: ZA615
data.value: You found 2000 gold!

data.name: ZA616
data.value: Now that your sword has been restored, you need armor befitting a Lacuna Reaver. I'm sure I have something lying around here somewhere...

data.name: ZA617
data.value: Ah! Here it is.

data.name: ZA618
data.value: You have received Obsidian Armor.

data.name: ZA619
data.value: You have received a Huge Potion and a Huge Tonic!

data.name: ZA620
data.value: Death Bringer

data.name: ZA621
data.value: Blood Leather

data.name: ZA622
data.value: Sorceress' Robes

data.name: ZA623
data.value: You found a Huge Potion!

data.name: ZA624
data.value: You found a Huge Tonic!

data.name: ZA625
data.value: Is that Blood Metal Ore!? I haven't seen crafting material of this caliber in ages. I can build you a magnificent weapon and armor set if you so desire.

data.name: ZA626
data.value: I call it!

data.name: ZA627
data.value: Right. Well I guess the new weapon and armor goes to the thief.

data.name: ZA628
data.value: Will has recieved the Death Bringer scythe and Blood Leather armor!

data.name: ZA629
data.value: This stuff better work or you'll be hearing from me. Uh, I mean, thanks....

data.name: ZA630
data.value: Sorry. I'm not very good with manners. I'm working on it.

data.name: ZA631
data.value: Ah, I see you found some Starfire Ore. That is a very rare ore with mysteriously magical properties.

data.name: ZA632
data.value: I could craft a very special weapon and armor set designed to enhance magical abilities if you would like.

data.name: ZA633
data.value: See if you can find me some more rare ores to work with. I truely enjoy the challenge of working with new materials.

data.name: ZA634
data.value: I hope the gifts I've made for you will help you to defeat Mal'ticar. The fate of our world rests on your shoulders now.

data.name: ZA635
data.value: Yes, please!

data.name: ZA636
data.value: I've been getting a little tired of my old gear anyway...

data.name: ZA637
data.value: Cara has recieved Sorceress' Robes and Book of Myths!

data.name: ZA638
data.value: I'm particularly proud of my work this time.

data.name: ZA639
data.value: You have bits of Starfire Ore crafted to your armor and the pendant in your book to amplify your magical skills.

data.name: ZA640
data.value: I can't thank you enough Zella. I promise to make good use of what you've given me.

data.name: ZA641
data.value: Nathan! You did it!

data.name: ZA642
data.value: Where did he go? What happend!?

data.name: ZA643
data.value: It's over. Mal'ticar is gone.

data.name: ZA644
data.value: What do we do now?

data.name: ZA645
data.value: My people need me. I made a promise to live for this kingdom and I plan to uphold it.

data.name: ZA646
data.value: That sounds like a good plan to me. I'll help.

data.name: ZA647
data.value: I guess you can count me in too. You'll need all the help you can get.

data.name: ZA648
data.value: You still have something of a monster infestation after all.

data.name: ZA649
data.value: Our job is far from over. Thank you for helping. My parents would be proud.

data.name: ZA650
data.value: The cursed Knight stabs it's target with it's empowered spear.

data.value: Nemesis Cannon

data.name: ZA652
data.value: Arlan transmits unknown energy from another realm that damages all opposing enemies. May leave targets poisoned.

data.name: ZA653
data.value: Drains the energy from the soul, replenishing the life of the caster and steals their strength and stamina.

data.value: Pandoras box has gained the powers of Boggimus, dealing great damage and curses all targets.

data.value: This target has been endowed with increased stats, health regeneration, and sp regeneration.

data.name: ZA661
data.value: Tippers is on fire! The hot emissions from Tippers' body damages all opponents at the start of his turn.

data.name: ZA662
data.value: The Serlynx smashes the ground with his hammer, reducing the targets armor, healing Serlynx, and may restore Stamina to Serlynx.

data.name: ZA663
data.value: Miasma

data.name: ZA664
data.value: A noxious gas emission that damages the enemy. This may leave the targets blinded and weakened.

data.name: ZA665
data.value: Ah, it's you. I bet you're wondering why I'm here. While you were out, we were invaded and now we're all dead!

data.name: ZA666
data.value: Just kidding! Endor came to me with a new business venture.

data.name: ZA667
data.value: He thought creating this astral projection of myself could double my profit, but I tend to get little business out here for some reason.

data.name: ZA668
data.value: Let me heal those wounds for you sir.

data.name: ZA669
data.value: Nathan, Cara, and Will went on to rid Agora of the evil that still remained. Those years were long and grueling, but the bond they formed was stronger for it. Through their efforts and the help of the survivors, they were able to rebuild the kingdom to be even grander than it was before. Nathan took his place on the throne where he worked tirelessly to solve the problems of his people and his subjects loved him all the more for it.

data.name: ZA670
data.value: Cara spent much of the early years healing the wounded and teaching others how to heal as well. Word quickly spread and Cara eventually became a symbol of love and devotion to the people of Agora. Word around the castle is that Nathan and Cara have been seen taking strolls around the garden as of late. News of their union is expected in the near future.

data.name: ZA671
data.value: The lack of control Will felt everyday due to his blindness instantly disappeared when he was defending himself in combat. Will's desire to feel in control led him to train others how to be skilled fighters like himself....by fighting them of course. Will eventually learned to treat others with a little more kindness and respect, even if it was just a ploy to steal their things later.

data.name: ZA672
data.value: The three heros remain vigilant against the return of Mal'ticar for who could know what plots are forming in the shadows.

data.name: ZA673
data.value: Thank you for playing Lacuna Reaver

data.name: ZA674
data.value: A memorial was held in Will's honor soon after his death. Nathan and Cara told stories of their travels and how Will selflessly risked his life in service of their cause. Over the years, tales of Will turned to legend and songs were written in his memory. A statue of Will stands in the courtyard of Verithus Castle so all who visit may remember his sacrifice.

data.name: ZA675
data.value: The two heros remain vigilant against the return of Mal'ticar for who could know what plots are forming in the shadows.
